thread.title: Dell’s $ 67billon EMC deal and other tech acquisitions: Infographic
thread.title_full: Dell’s $ 67billon EMC deal and other tech acquisitions: Infographic

title: Dell’s $ 67billon EMC deal and other tech acquisitions: Infographic
text: Share Dell has staged a grand entry on the deal street by snapping up storage giant EMC for $67 billion. This is the largest merger in the technology industry. Dell plans to pay $24.05 a share in cash plus tracking stock in EMC's prize holding, VMware, valued at about $9 for each EMC share.The mega merger is twice as big as the previous largest tech-only deal, which was the Compaq-HP deal, valued at $33.4 billion.Here's a sneak peak at other tech acquisitions that pale in comparison to the Dell-EMC merger.
